{% import "cpp/utils.txt" as utils %}
{% if not options["header_only"] %}
/*
 * Generated by FlatBoobs from {{ parser.root_struct_def.file|basename }}
 */

#include "{{ parser.root_struct_def.file|stem + '_flatboobs.hpp' }}"
{% endif %}

{% for group in parser.types
    | map("attr", "definition")
    | selectattr("file", "equalto", parser.root_struct_def.file)
    | groupby("defined_namespace") %}
{% for component in group.grouper.components %}
namespace {{ component }} {
{% endfor %}

/*
 * Implementation of enums
 */

{% for enum_def in group.list|select("instance_of", "EnumDef")
        |sort(attribute="name") %}
{% include "cpp/enum.cpp.txt" %}
{% endfor %}

/*
 * Implementation of structs and tables
 */

{% for struct_def in group.list|select("instance_of", "StructDef")
        |sort(attribute="name") %}
{% set struct_name = utils.escape(struct_def.name) %}
{% set iface_class = utils.interface_class(struct_def) %}
{% set mutable_class = utils.mutable_class(struct_def) %}
{% set flatbuffer_class = utils.flatbuffer_class(struct_def) %}
{% set unpacked_class = utils.unpacked_class(struct_def) %}
{% set fields = struct_def.fields|rejectattr("attributes.deprecated")|list %}
{% include "cpp/istruct.cpp.txt" %}
{% if not struct_def.fixed %}
{% include "cpp/unpacked_table.cpp.txt" %}
{% include "cpp/pack_unpack.cpp.txt" %}
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}

{% for component in group.grouper.components|reverse %}
}  // {{ component }}
{% endfor %}
{% endfor %}


{#
// vim: syntax=cpp
// vim: tabstop=2
// vim: shiftwidth=2
#}
